originalText.text: Carolyn was amazing.  Not only did she find us our dream apartment, she helped us every step of the way from our board package to inspections to board interview! She knows NY like the back of her hand.  I will be referring her to all our friends and family. 5 star all the way!

text.text: Carolyn was amazing.  Not only did she find us our dream apartment, she helped us every step of the way from our board package to inspections to board interview! She knows NY like the back of her hand.  I will be referring her to all our friends and family. 5 star all the way!

originalText.text:
Carolyn Fox is amazing. She is the consummate professional, knows the business inside and out and never gives up!
My daughter and I worked with Carolyn through a long process to buy a co-op. She was our ally every step of the way, guiding us and supporting us through every step. We couldn’t have done it with out her.

text.text:

originalText.text:
Here's to Carolyn, the agent so divine,
In the world of real estate, she'll always shine,
With attention to detail, and a keen, watchful eye,
She'll search high and low, under the New York sky,
For that one special place, where your heart will reside,
Where laughter will echo, and memories abide.
She'll negotiate deals with finesse and with grace,
Turning challenges into opportunities to embrace,
Her dedication unwavering, her passion so clear,
With Carolyn as your agent, success is quite near.

originalText.text:
It has been a pleasure having Carolyn as my realtor.  She is extremely knowledgeable of the industry and does her research.
Carolyn is professional but very caring and make sure she worked in our best interest.  She has worked very hard to ensure in a very short time frame we acquire a property that suited our needs.  We put lots of pressure on her due to time constraints and she made herself available and made sure to meet our deadline. Best realtor!!!

text.text:

We put lots of pressure on her due to time constraints and she made herself available and made sure to meet our deadline. Best realtor!!!

originalText.text: I have worked with many real estate agents over the years, both professionally and personally. In my opinion, Carolyn is one of the best I have ever dealt with.  I found her to be straight-forward, honest, hard-working and very responsive.  She is very knowledgeable about the city and works with you to develop a targeted plan of action, even in difficult market conditions. I can't recommend highly enough.
